localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Accelerate your development & build fully customizable video-based applications with the performance, scale, and reliability of Zoom's industry leading video-first communications platform. â € Get started at no charge with 10,000 session minutes per month.
nodes.title: Video SDK from Zoom - Build fully customizable video-based apps
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Developers have been using the Grouparoo UI to set up automated data movement from their databases to cloud-based tools like Mailchimp. Grouparoo now supports declarative code to set up this pipeline so you manage data sync just like you would any other app.
nodes.title: Grouparoo 2.0 - Integrate with marketing tools using low-code configuration
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: VS Code Theme Studio enables you to quickly and easily design your own VS Code theme in an intuitive, user-friendly, web-based interface. No more messing around with nasty JSON files, editing raw hex color codes, and tweaking settings.
nodes.title: VS Code Theme Studio - Create your own VS Code theme easily, within your browser
nodes.author: Mike Tromba

nodes.excerpt: What if programming was about ideas, not semicolons? Compose, abstract, generalise. Start from top down or bottom up and refine as you go. With Nodes, programming feels like sketching on a canvas.
nodes.title: Nodes - Thinking space for exploring ideas with code
nodes.author: Sonu Jung

nodes.excerpt: Recipes are a new way to create step-by-step code walkthroughs right in your ReadMe documentation. By helping you showcase the best use cases for your APIs, it's easy for developers to get started faster while saving your team time on developer support.
nodes.title: ReadMe Recipes - Step-by-step code walkthroughs for your API
nodes.author: Gregory Koberger

nodes.excerpt: Connect your SQL database to Clay to insert your query results directly in Google Sheets. Goodbye to hopping between SQL editors, CSV downloads, Excel, and Dashboards. Have your financial models, growth charts, and customer lists always up to date!
nodes.title: ClaySQL - Run SQL queries directly in Google Sheets
nodes.author: Jordan Banafsheha

nodes.excerpt: Alpaca offers the worldâ€™s first commission-free fractional trading API to allow us to build more flexible quant trading models and fintech apps.
nodes.title: Alpaca Fractional Trading API - Commission-free API to trade & invest for as little as $1
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: Vantage is a cloud cost transparency platform currently supporting AWS. Securely link your AWS account in a click of a button and we'll automatically show you where your costs are coming from and how they're trending.
nodes.title: Vantage - A cloud cost transparency platform
nodes.author: Ben Schaechter

nodes.excerpt: Focus on one important task today. You decide what to focus on. After you set today's task you can't change or delete it. Keep a streak of days you finished your daily task.
nodes.title: TinyDo - One task today
nodes.author: Igor Dyachuk

nodes.excerpt: Night Eye WP dark mode plugin is a powerful software that uses advanced algorithm to enable dark mode on your WordPress website. Night Eye uses smart color conversion, is highly customizable and extremely easy to use.
nodes.title: WordPress Dark Mode Plugin - Add smooth dark mode on your WordPress website
nodes.author: Stanislav Dimitrov

nodes.excerpt: With Palette you can add colors to your palette and click to copy the HEX when you need a color.
nodes.title: Palette - Store and share colors between apps
nodes.author: Dave

nodes.excerpt: Porter is a platform that makes AWS/GCP as easy to use as Heroku. With instant deploys from Git, built-in autoscaling, and automatic SSL, Porter gives you the convenience of a PaaS while preserving flexibility and control.
nodes.title: Porter - Heroku that runs in your own cloud
nodes.author: Michael Seibel

nodes.excerpt: Uranus - Wireframe Kit is a Premium wireframing pack with more than 140+ dark/light ready-to-use web elements/sections. The basement idea of this kit was started from the wireframing time problem! ğŸ”¥ Will be available in Sketch, Adobe Xd & Code format soon.
nodes.title: Uranus v1.2 - Wireframe kit with 140+ modern UI web sections for Figma
nodes.author: Simmmple

nodes.excerpt: Engineering time is valuable, and securing your application flows can be challenging and time consuming. With OTPfy you can secure any part of your application with ease without wasting any more time and resources.
nodes.title: OTPfy - Secure your apps with magic links and one time passwords
nodes.author: Alex Casillas

nodes.excerpt: This API enables you to scrape any data from any website, without worrying about proxies, CAPTCHAs, headless browsers and many other complexities involved in web scraping. We make sure you never get blocked again!
nodes.title: Web Scraper API - Scrape the web at scale without getting blocked
nodes.author: Philip KÃ¤llberg

nodes.excerpt: Firecrown allows app developers to build Flutter widgets visually. Our code generator provides clean and maintainable Flutter code, which can easily be customized and integrated in your IDE.
nodes.title: Firecrown - Build customized Flutter widgets visually
nodes.author: Lucas Josefiak

nodes.excerpt: Sonar.Network provides automatic daily website analysis. Analysis of more than 50 SEO errors, checking all website pages for CSS, JS, HTML validation. Payment for each site separately, the limit of 50,000 pages per site, daily checks, notifications.
nodes.title: Sonar Network - Automatic daily website analysis
nodes.author: Artur Noimann

nodes.excerpt: Use your web apps as true apps with Firework! ğŸš€ Turn your everyday websites into desktop apps ğŸ•¹ Keep them on hand on the Taskbar or Dock ğŸ The apps launch instantly and are immediately ready to use ğŸ­ Switch between your web apps using familiar methods
nodes.title: Firework 2 - Easy access to web sites and applications
nodes.author: Alexey Fedorov

nodes.excerpt: Jumpstart your next SaaS product with Bedrock: the modern full-stack Next.js & GraphQL boilerplate with user authentication, subscription payments, teams, invitations, emails and everything else you need
nodes.title: Bedrock - Full-stack Next.js & GraphQL boilerplate for SaaS products
nodes.author: Nik Graf

nodes.excerpt: Shar.ec is designed to let you share end-to-end encrypted screen recordings easily.
nodes.title: Shar.ec - Share end-to-end encrypted screen recordings
nodes.author: Fredrik Jonsson

nodes.excerpt: Collect your avatar from different parts. The code of this program is very easy, any developer will be able to understand the code. SVG is used to draw an avatar. Demo version of the project: https://avatar-maker-vue.netlify.app/
nodes.title: Avatar Maker - Create your own avatar
nodes.author: David Voskanyan

nodes.excerpt: Create simple shareable polls in seconds. Share your polls across all of your channels - newsletter, group text, Twitter, etc. No sign up required.
nodes.title: minipoll - Create simple shareable polls in seconds
nodes.author: Ryan Gilbert

nodes.excerpt: Generate blob shapes: - Set Solid color - Set Gradient colors - Set a pattern background - Custom image clipping - Save and manage blobs locally - Sharable URL - Dark mode - Works offline and PWA support - Faster initial load and better performance - Blob change sound
nodes.title: Blobs 2.0 - Generate beautiful blobs for your design
nodes.author: Lokesh

nodes.title: Tailwind UI Kit - 600+ components, 30 templates, React, Angular, & Vue support
nodes.author: Arslan Khan

nodes.excerpt: The Awesome lists on GitHub are great, but it's hard to know which projects are actively maintained and sift through them all easily. I built this tool to help me visualize and query all of the cool resources people put together.
nodes.title: Awesome Viewer - Visualize all of Github's awesome lists
nodes.author: Aryaman Sharda
